At the exact same time, over 114,000 more infants, toddlers and preschoolers became uninsured.

We need to be taking care of our children, not handing out corporate welfare to billionaires. https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/many-young-children-are-now-going-without-health-insurance/2020/02/28/a651bce4-533b-11ea-9e47-59804be1dcfb_story.html

The status quo is unacceptable. Half measures are not enough.

We need Medicare for All now.
